proposedChanges.value: Add a concise tagline summarizing the benefit under the main headline.
proposedChanges.rationale: Clarifies the core value proposition immediately.

proposedChanges.value: Make the hero CTA more prominent with a contrasting color.
proposedChanges.rationale: Draws immediate attention to the primary action.

proposedChanges.value: Use a simplified table to present pricing tiers clearly.
Incorporate customer testimonials with specific outcomes.
proposedChanges.rationale: Increases trust through relatable success stories.

proposedChanges.value: Add a sticky CTA button on mobile for constant visibility.
proposedChanges.rationale: Ensures CTA is always accessible on mobile.

proposedChanges.value: Place the solution section immediately after the hero.
proposedChanges.rationale: Prioritizes showcasing how the product solves problems.

proposedChanges.value: Highlight data security features prominently in the trust section.
proposedChanges.rationale: Addresses safety concerns for business data.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure hero image and text stack vertically on mobile.
proposedChanges.rationale: Improves readability and focus on small screens.

assumptions: Users value quick access to key information
